scripts.build: vwp build --env.js '[name].b.js' && cat dist/*.b.js > dist/paliari-vue.js && rm -f dist/*.b.js dist/index.html
scripts.dist: vwp dist --env.css '[name].min.css' --env.js '[name].m.js' && cat dist/*.m.js > dist/paliari-vue.min.js && rm -f dist/*.m.js dist/index.html
scripts.release: rm -rf dist && yarn run build && yarn run dist
